mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbs(num, userId, subject, content, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES(bbs_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m1 ON b.userid = m1.userid
SELECT num, b.userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, created, saveFilename, originalFilename FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m1 ON b.userid = m1.userid WHERE num = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m1 ON b.userId = m1.userId
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM bbs b JOIN member1 m1 ON b.userId = m1.userId
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM = 1
